text:
Self-driven cybersecurity student and continuous learner, specializing in cyber defense and ethical hacking, with additional skills in web development.
I master skills through daily hands-on practice and real-world projects on platforms like Hack The Box, TryHackMe, and TCM Security.
Through my journey, I am working to show that practical skills and online certifications can be just as valuable—if not more—than traditional academic paths.
I strive to prove that success does not require conventional theory-heavy learning or MCQ-based exams.
